txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'A large group of Orcs has been working within the Entwalk, a section of forest along the Eaves of Fangorn. Every tree the Orcs cut down is another volley of arrows, strut of a siege-weapon, or piece of palisade. We cannot allow them to have these resources unchecked.\n\n'Head into the forest and disrupt their activities by defeating any Orcs you find within the Entwalk.'
'Many more Orcs will come to the Entwalk and will replace those defeated today, but for now you have afforded us a short respite.'
'Any tree kept standing is a volley of arrows that we do not have to endure. Are you ready to venture into the Entwalk?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
The Entwalk: Orcs in the Trees
Orcs are maurading through the Entwalk, cutting down the forest to create their encampments and siege-weapons.
Orcs can be found in the Entwalk.\n\nDernstan has asked you to venture within the Entwalk and defeat the Orcs pillaging the forest.
Dernstan is at Eaworth.\n\nDernstan will be pleased to hear that the Orcs within the Entwalk have been thinned.
